Home.title: HARD ENDURO
Home.about_description: In the heart of Antalya, Kemer, an epic adventure begins, stretching from the turquoise waters of the Mediterranean to the cloudy peaks of Mount Tahtalı, home of ancient gods. Here, you will encounter the harshest face of history and the wildest side of nature. This is not just a motorcycle race, but a relentless test of willpower rising from sea level to 2365 meters over 2 days—a challenge that pushes all limits: Olympos Hard Enduro awaits you!

Register.emailDesc: Please enter a valid email address to start the registration process.
